Rachael Little's Homepage

Relative navigation links can be added at the end of the content for any page.

In the front matter of any page, set previous_page or next_page to the id of the page to link to.

The label will behave similar to the sidebar nav label. If sidebar_label is set, that will be used otherwise the title will be used.

Example

---
id: page-2
title: Page 2
previous_page: page-1
next_page: page-3
---
